mapMove

public void mapMove(float dx,
                    float dy)
Called when position of the camera must be changed;

Parameters:
dx - - delta in x coordinate in units;
dy - - delta in y coordinates in units;

scaleChanged

public void scaleChanged(int dw,
                         int clicks)
Called when height of the camera above scene must be changed. Usually this method handle mouse wheel action if dw > 0 - height increase. otherwise height decrease;

Parameters:
dw - - value of change;
